actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tax-exempt interest shall not be taken into account in determining the portion of social security benefits subject to income taxation.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement that tax-exempt interest be taken into account when determining the portion of social security and railroad retirement benefits that is subject to tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tax-exempt interest shall not be taken into account in determining the portion of social security benefits subject to income taxation.
